SS dodged, but was thrown off course and crashed into
the Pred base.  After he recovered a moment later he
sent a stream of intense fire at Quickstrike.

--- catmastero <catmastero@...> wrote:
> Quickstrike pryed himself from SS's jaws before they
> reached to hight 
> but still got alot of dents when he hit the terrain
> "Alright that did 
> it" he said angerly juming up and fired a venom
> blast at SS.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > SS went to maximum speed in a flash, while
> > Quickstrikes tail was distracted flying at Tyreal
> he
> > flew down so he was level with it and attempted to
> > grab it up in his mouth, lift Quickstrike up
> several
> > thousand feet, and drop him.
> > 
> > --- catmastero <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > > "Alright, time to start thrashing" Quickstrike
> > > exclaimed running out 
> > > the back door and fired a an energy blast at
> Tyrael.
> > > 
> > > Inferno, who had finnaly been repaired flew out
> of
> > > the base and fired 
> > > a rocket at Burrock "By royal command!"
> > > 
> > > Waspinator flew out of the base and begun
> looking
> > > for a target.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...>
> > > wrote:
> > > > ooC: The Pred base has no shields, no auto
> guns,
> > > mild sensors, and 
> > > > that's about it right now. Switchblade just
> > > finished making the 
> > > auto 
> > > > guns and other base defenses. Otherwise it's a
> > > sitting duck. The 
> > > > armour however is heavy, and can take quite a
> bit
> > > of punishment 
> > > > before hurtin too much. =p (read the ooC at
> the
> > > end as well)
> > > > 
> > > > -- Megatron --
> > > > 
> > > > Megatron grumbles as the Predacon base is
> splayed
> > > with weaponfire 
> > > > from two sides. "Note to self, repair sensors,
> and
> > > set up base 
> > > > defenses." 
> > > > 
> > > > He starts into a brisk walk as he heads to the
> > > base exit. He opens 
> > > a 
> > > > commlink to Switchblade, "Switchblade, look
> around
> > > in the storage 
> > > > bay, there might be something we can use down
> > > there. We're in a bit 
> > > > of a pinch right now." He reaches the exit,
> and
> > > stops short.
> > > > 
> > > > Megatron frowns as he opens a basewide
> commlink,
> > > "Preceptor, 
> > > > Waspinator, Inferno if you're active,
> Quickstrike,
> > > Warhead, and all 
> > > > other Preds prepare for battle, this could get
> > > messy."
> > > > 
> > > > The outer sensors pick up Tyreal's ultimatum.
> > > "Hah!" Megatron 
> > > laughs 
> > > > sarcasticly, "Turn myself in... of course I'm
> not
> > > going to agree to 
> > > > that slag..." He switches to external
> speakers, "I
> > > don't care who 
> > > > you are. Who would agree to such terms...
> > > Bewarned, if you stay 
> > > here 
> > > > and bother me, your lives are forfeit. You get
> one
> > > warning before 
> > > > death, so I hope you choose wisely."
> > > > 
> > > > He closes the external comm, and opens another
> > > comm to 
> > > > Switchblade. "Switchblade, found anything
> yet?"
> > > > 
> > > >
> ------------------------------------------------
> > > > 
> > > > Switchblade grumbles when he gets Megatron's
> first
> > > comm, "Ya ya, 
> > > i'm 
> > > > looking." He fiddles around with the nearest
> > > sealed container, 
> > > > hacking the passlock, and disableing the
> > > protections. Inside he 
> > > > finds a bunch of energon pulse weapons, a
> newer
> > > Tripred design, 
> > > > although he's unsure how effective they are. 
> > > > 
> > > > He moves onto the next sealed crate, and is
> about
> > > to open it when 
> > > he 
> > > > gets Megatron's second message. "Alright, I'm
> > > looking, so lemme 
> > > > alone for a bit. You'll know if i find
> anything."
> > > He starts working 
> > > > on another sealed crate, wondering why his
> hacking
> > > process is 
> > > taking 
> > > > a little longer than before...
> > > > 
> > > >
> -----------------------------------------------
> > > > 
> > > > ooC: One more thing, the Preds are few right
> now,
> > > so without 
> > > > intervention, they may get a sever ass
> kicking. =p
> > > I'd like to 
> > > > propose starting a base storyline which starts
> > > with the artifacts 
> > > > which are located in the Predacon storage bay
> > > right now. The ones 
> > > > which none of the bots know about, or what
> they
> > > are. Something that 
> > > > would involve triggering an effect of the
> > > artifact, which would 
> > > > cause the Predacons to win the battle, but
> maybe
> > > the artifact could 
> > > > switch hands, and then a sort of power
> struggle
> > > would ensue.
> > > 
> > > 
> >
